name: Wanna Run Again - Sprite Girl
description:
• 16 Chapter of Game Story.
  • Easy Mode for Causal Player, Hard Mode for Hardcore Players.
StoryMew, a normal girl lives in Seamoon twin island. One day, she fell into an uncanny space. She made new friend there, but never realize how much her life will change because of these unusual dreams...GameplayWanna Run Again is a platform jumping game. Together with Mew, we travel through different dreams (stages), have fun with simple and lively pleasure of jumping.
